Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Graham B
Reviews.Content: This boutique hotel is in a one-way street in a vibrant part of Istanbul. Each guest room is named after a well-known artist, mine being the Rembrandt room. Rooms are large, tastefully furnished, quiet, and breakfast is on the top floor, giving a wide view over the city. Staff were most helpful in organising visits to the various places that I needed to attend, and were able to recommend nearby places where one could obtain an excellent variety of meals. A pleasant oasis in a busy, cosmopolitan and often confusing city! Thoroughly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and easy”
Reviews.Author: SandraPonzano
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the Nisantasi area of Istanbul, very easy to go by feet, and taxis come near the hotel to bring you everywhere. Huge and beautiful rooms, include a kitchen. Breakfast is ok, there's all you can want. Service is ok, very welcomng and helping. So, to visit Istandul, Gallery is the perfect place to stay

Reviews.Title: “Gallery Residence - Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: bballnut100
Reviews.Content: Positives - friendly staff, physical ccondition of building, breakfast & location. Negative - we specifically searched for "air conditioned rooms" which this hotel advertised, but the air conditioning was turned off for the winter. Room was too hot to sleep and with the window open, it was too noisy to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: jalonzo
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the Nisantasi area of Istanbul, in a quiet sort of residential area (I say sort of since Istanbul is an open market pretty much everywhere!!) Huge rooms, for european standards, and include a kitchen. Breakfast is ok, though could improve quite a lot. Service is just overwhelming. From the reception guys, the girl in the breakfast room, everyone. And the best thing: they speak english!!! No one seems to speak english in Istanbul, or at least no when its not convenient for them. One piece of luggage of ours didnt arrive, and the guys at reception were a huge help in communicating with Turkish Airlines. Overall, Istanbul is a great city, and Gallery is the perfect place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Gallery residence hotel, Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: azzamhammad
Reviews.Content: Oveall it was a good stay. The hotel is clean, the staff are nice and helpfull. I was on the third floor and once you close the window the noise level is comfortable. I used the free wifi on my tablet and it was fine. Breakfast selection is good enough. The location of the hotel is very close to the Osmanbey Metro Station. Onr minor issue if you are sharing the room with a friend, the bathroom has a non-transparent glass door and it may be embarassing to some people.

Reviews.Title: “absolutely perfect”
Reviews.Author: LitochoroMaria
Reviews.Content: great location, clean, big, nice rooms with many services. Very kind and helpful staff. My next stay at Istanbul will difinitely be to Gallery Residence!

Reviews.Title: “Great place at walking distance to Congress Center”
Reviews.Author: Rominawulf77
Reviews.Content: I stay there for a Congress. ItÂ´s only 5 min walk. Near Metro and fashion centerwith lots of restaurants ans bars. Also you can walk to Taksim square (20 min). Very nice hotel. Modern and comfortable. The kitchen and living room was great. Nice breakfast. Personal at loby very kind.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: fitza73
Reviews.Content: Good location. Helpful staff. Excelent breakfast. Beautiful views from breakfast room. Wonderful paintings everywhere of famous painters.

Reviews.Title: “Simply perfect”
Reviews.Author: MATT3O
Reviews.Content: 2 nights stay on past October. All at Gallery Hotel was more than impeccable (kindness and courtesy of all the staff, accommodation, facilities). Location is really cool, and not far from city centre, if you are interested in doinâ€™ some tourism. Are you found of art, architecture and design? This is what you are going to breath during your sojourn there. Needless to say that I will come back for sure, in my next visit to Istanbul :)

Reviews.Title: “between the best solution in istanbul.”
Reviews.Author: nicola9042
Reviews.Content: it is great because you are in the best part of istanbul, safe,calm,a lot shopping, restaurant near the taxi,unbdergrood and stuff,you have all and you can live calm.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you very much for everything!”
Reviews.Author: zeynabaghirova
Reviews.Content: It was a great pleasure to stay in Your hotel! Excelent location, beautiful interior and refined details, comfort and very careful treatment of personnel. When I come to Istanbul next time, I will defenetely stay in Gallery Recidense and Boutique hotel. Thank you very much for everything.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Service, Central Location, Great Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: kezzyhomeros
Reviews.Content: The Residence is literally spotless. Cleaning ladies are very nice, fast and quite effective. Once youâ€™ve pressed the â€œplease clean the room buttonâ€� you can expect them in three minutes at your door. Room cleaning was excellent. The only downside is they donâ€™t vacuum clean your room every day. Location depends on your needs and interests in Istanbul, but with a walking distance to nearest tube / metro station and reasonable taxi prices in Istanbul you can get to anywhere youâ€™d like. Although, Residenceâ€™s location is very central. Nisantasi, Taksim, Sisli, Levent, Besiktas and Bosphorus is in one or two tube stations away. But, if youâ€™re looking for a historical sightseeing in Istanbul, you would better choose a hotel in historical peninsula. Itâ€™s still close enough to visit those attractions though. The residence is on a one-way, small but busy street. Itâ€™s a shortcut between two big roads, so expect some continuous traffic flow. As an extra, there is a building construction across the street and causes some noise pollution. So you better get a room facing courtyard, not street. The breakfast was simple but sufficient. The breakfast staff were polite and very obliging. The breakfast room was pleasant and hygienic with decent views. Rooms are modern, spacious and clean. You get what you see on their website. No funny business about it. The only flaw for me was air conditioning unit in rooms. It's not individually controlled system and you get what the central heating system gives you. I really would prefer an individual air conditioner in rooms, in terms of what I am paying for per night. Staff & Service is perfect. They are very professional, kind, practical and quick. Compliments to Nuri, Yavuz and Ozlem.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: yoruc
Reviews.Content: As former resident of Nisantasi I like to stay at Gallery Residence, since it is a house as all in a name with the services of a hotel. I can recommend anyone who wishes to stay in this neighbourhood and area. Looking forward returning soon again, thank you for the kind service and great assistance.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable, well located in Istanbul, with very kind and helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: demirozgul
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a month in this hotel for a business trip.It was really calm and well located . It is near to the Osmanbey metro. You can go easily wherever you want by metro, bus or taxi...There are few rooms (around 25) which are really spacious with a kitchen. It is not very far from Taksim and there are a lot of bars and restaurant around.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, clean, cosy, great location”
Reviews.Author: TanDublin_Ireland
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the residence for a week while attending a conference in Istanbul. The hotel management actually emailed a few days before check-in, which I thought was a nice touch. May be a little tricky to find when you pre-book transfer from hotel - but with a phone call, the driver will get you there. Room is spacious, clean, new - and has free wifi. Reception staff speaks English - which is really rare in Istanbul - so that was great. Nice touches here and there - when you check-in, there are 2 small bottles of water, as well as a box of turkish delight waiting for you. For those attending events at the convention centre, the residence is just a stone's throw away. Just need to walk down the street, cross the road into a park, turn right at the cafe in the park, and there you are. I also used the gym and sauna during my stay - it was great. I think the previous reviewers have covered all other points. I had a great stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Truststar
Reviews.Content: Nice Rooms, cleaned perfectly every day. Breakfast fantastic. Very friendly personal. Quit rooms. Great Location, only 300 meters from Metro

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable home away from home in Istanbul.”
Reviews.Author: AnnaCCC
Reviews.Content: While in Istanbul my friend and I stayed for one week at the Gallery Residence at the recommendation of a friend. We had no idea what to expect but were so pleased that we stayed here. The rooms were spacious and clean and the staff was excellent. The girl that worked at the front desk was so amazingly helpful and sweet- she was always ready to recommend the best places to go, how to get there, and called us taksis which we really appreciated (it definitely helped that her English was perfect since we spoke no Turkish). The hotel is on a quiet street right off the main shopping area of Nistantasi and is close to tons of cafes, shops, and museums. Its very easy to get to from the airport as well- just take the Havas bus from Ataturk to Taksim Square and then its one metro stop away (get off on Osmanbey). The complimentery breakfast is great. My only regret is that we didn't have enough time to take advantage of the full amenities like the gym and sauna.

Reviews.Title: “Great spacious room, nice quality, quiet neighbourhood”
Reviews.Author: rishidalal
Reviews.Content: Although a little difficult to find as it is situated in a small lane, once you get there, the hotel is in a nice little building in a quiet alley of trendy Nisantasi. I was greeted with a friendly staff, and once I entered the hotel, it feels like a small apartment building of your own. The check-in process is very quick. Once I got to my room, I was pleasantly surprised at the size. The room I stayed in was a 400 sq ft studio apartment, with a comfortable sofa, a writing desk, a very comfortable ans big bed, a kitchenette and a spacious bathroom. As I was staying here for 10 days, it felt like my apartment. The decor is clean and neat and modern. The drawbacks in the room are a few. The tv is very small, and perched up at a height where you can't see it from the bed. Even from the sofa, it is far too small. The cable system was also a little complicated. The sofa is right in front of a french window, which obstructs it from being opened completely. The breakfast is standard but decent. The staff is friendly and can help you with suggestions of what to do. I'd definitely stay here again until I find something better in the price range.

Reviews.Title: “Best Apart in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Hakansr
Reviews.Content: It was absolutely the best Apart I've ever stayed. I stayed with my family for a month and was extremely satisfied with the service and room design

Reviews.Title: “Like a Home”
Reviews.Author: ibrik
Reviews.Content: I stayed almost 3 weeks in this lovely place. The best points for me are the closeness to both Nisantasi (high class shopping area) and Taksim (gbest place for night life and sightseeing). If you like walking in green, the Macka park is so close too. The comfort of the rooms are as good as the breakfast with panaromic view. The only difficulty is parking if you have a car..

Reviews.Title: “Home Away from Home at the Gallery Residence”
Reviews.Author: London-lad48
Reviews.Content: The 3 days I spent in Istanbul were a dream come true that began before arriving in the city with the Gallery Residence. After confirming my reservation, further information was emailed informing me of the many services of the hotel. The fluent English speaking concierge was most helpful in suggesting itineraries and making reservations. Tourist maps and information were readily available in my room and in the lobby. Being in a safe and quiet neighborhood, it is an excellent location for the tourist; major attractions close by as is the metro. The hotel staff could not do enough for us. Nothing seemed to be impossible for them. The hotel room was very comfortable and equipped with all modern conveniences and the highest standards of cleanliness were in practice througout my suite and the hotel. My next visit to Istanbul, I will return to my "home away from home", the Gallery Residence.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel!!! Next to great shopping”
Reviews.Author: skibum2678
Reviews.Content: We had just gotten off a 12-day cruise from Croatia, Greece, and Turkey. The hotel is magnificent with large spacious rooms and modern bathrooms. The shower may be the best amenity. Additionally, there is a very nicely equiped workout room in the basement of the building. Besides the gym equipment, there are two bath tubs and sauna to relax from a day of walking around the city. Breakfast (included) is served on the top floor of the hotel looking out across the city. The view is wonderful. The hotel staff are friendly and very helpful. We wish all hotels were this nice with such incredible service.

Reviews.Title: “Nice small apartment but not 4 star and so close to Taksim Square”
Reviews.Author: Helal1
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night in the Gallery residence. It is not a four star hotel at all. It is a Boutique category hotel. The reception is very small and the hotel neighborhood is not that good. They say it is 10 min walk from taksim street but it takes me about 20 min. The rooms are great. They are well equipped as an apartment. Freg and small kitchen and all small nice touches.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay..”
Reviews.Author: can8
Reviews.Content: . Iâ€™m staying on regularly basis at the Gallery Residence in Istanbul. I highly recommend the accommodation, especially because of the nice people who do there work very good and with a kindliness. The rooms are well-kept and very clean. The location is also very good. If you look for a small and a middle standard place, than I would definitely recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable rooms - totally amateur service and staff!”
Reviews.Author: WJOSHUK
Reviews.Content: The Gallery residence is really good on paper. However the reality leaves quite a bit to be desired. Plusses: Location, reasonable level of kitchen equipment and furnishing, comfortable bed. Minusses: Staff very amateur, Sauna doesn;t work, Laundry not back within time (1 day late is a big deal to a traveller), breakfast is not worth the effort. Don't get folled into taking any rooms on the ground or basement floors. You look onto a very inpleasant internal staircase. Also mobile phone reception is non existent Water smells of chlorine Overall if you are looking for a central place which is small and down-market boutique - in other words trying to be boutique but fails then the Gallery is for you. The staff while friendly enough are totally inefficient - unable to see the customer point of view and really give the impression of not caring. In Turkey this is quite unusual

HotelInfo.Name: Gallery Residence
HotelInfo.Address: Valikonagi Cad. Suleyman Nazif Sok. No: 10 | Nisantasi, Istanbul 34371, Turkey
